general.title: Changelog
general.description:
All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/), and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

entries.author: Marcel
entries.message: Added change log functionality and improved git manager

entries.author: Marcel
entries.message: Transformed trade set dictionaries into class

entries.author: Marcel
entries.message: Prices are now kept and updated in a price class including time stamp to avoid rest api calls for prices that have already been queries recently
